error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_get_messages(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::all() or \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::messagesByType() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ms_ajax_form_example.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
